**Create Homescreen - Manage Bookmarks & Tasks with Our Privacy-Focused Chrome Extension**

Looking for a powerful yet minimalist tool to streamline your online experience? Our Chrome extension combines an advanced **Bookmark Manager** and a **Minimalist To-Do List** to help you stay organized and productive.

🚀🚀🚀
**New version is published as a completely new product:** https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/new-tab-home-page-screen/dmdeigebfbjbndnnaheobifpfnkhlgbo** with updated UI and folder mechanism.**
🚀🚀🚀

**Key Features:**

- 🌐 **Advanced Bookmark Manager**: Easily organize and access your essential websites.
- 📝 **Minimalist To-Do List**: Keep track of tasks without the clutter.
- 📱 **Responsive Design**: Optimized for all devices, including mobile via Kiwi Browser.
- 🌙 **Dark Mode & Custom Settings**: Personalize your experience with various settings.
- 🔒 **Privacy-Focused**: Your data stays in your browser unless you choose to save it manually. We do not track or store your information.
- 🖥️ **Versatile Bookmark Window**: Utilize an additional small window for quick access to bookmarks.

---

**Kiwi Browser Friendly**

- Use this extension seamlessly on your mobile device with Kiwi Browser  and other android browsers supporting chrome extensions ensuring compatibility.

---

**Why Choose Our Extension?**

- **Complete Control & Privacy**: You have full control over your data with no external storage unless you decide to save it manually.
- **Enhanced Productivity**: Streamline your workflow with easy access to bookmarks and tasks.
- **User-Friendly Interface**: Enjoy a clean, intuitive design that adapts to your needs.

---

**Changelog:**
- **UI & Feature Overhaul - New Extension**: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/new-tab-page-home-screen/dmdeigebfbjbndnnaheobifpfnkhlgbo

- **Version 1.3.1**: 
   - Compact bookmark setting.
   - Improved mobile UI to accommodate two bookmark rows.
   - Fixed settings bugs - background selection bug.
   - Error handler to manage incorrect import files.
   - Drag and drop for bookmarks and to do list items for mobile.
   - Code clean up.

- **Version 1.2.1.1**: To-Do List expansion, pop up window overhaul.

- **Version 1.2.0.0**: Overhauled responsive design across all breakpoints for an improved user experience.

---

**Get Started Today!**

Enhance your browsing experience with a tool that's both powerful and respectful of your privacy. Click "Add to Chrome" and enjoy your experience!
